author: hboutemy
msg: removed configuration not necessary any more now that source is compiled with JDK 5

author: rwesten
msg: The NEREngineCore does no longer cache models, but uses the now the model cache of the OpenNLP component.
This solves issues in cases where model data are not yet available at the time this engine is created.
This might be the case if the bundle with this engine is started before the bundle providing the model data (or a user adds the missing data to the datafiles directory).

author: simonetripodi
msg: set DTD URL reference in the doc comments
